description:
A recent commit[1] to python-novaclient has broken compatibility with stable/diablo.

> # nova suspend 4
> There is no such server action: suspend (HTTP 400)

nova-api.log:

> POST http://78.153.XXX.XXX:8774/v1.1/1/servers/30055fed-e259-44ad-a9c7-9dff83cf3e0f/action
> HTTP exception thrown: There is no such server action: suspend

[1] https://github.com/openstack/python-novaclient/commit/7a179e6577f176bedfe7a1faa39081c416dbd2e7
title: Current python-novaclient is incompatible with stable/diablo

comments.content:
A recent commit[1] to python-novaclient has broken compatibility with stable/diablo.

> # nova suspend 4
> There is no such server action: suspend (HTTP 400)

nova-api.log:

> POST http://78.153.XXX.XXX:8774/v1.1/1/servers/30055fed-e259-44ad-a9c7-9dff83cf3e0f/action
> HTTP exception thrown: There is no such server action: suspend

[1] https://github.com/openstack/python-novaclient/commit/7a179e6577f176bedfe7a1faa39081c416dbd2e7
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~kiall

comments.content: Latest novaclient shouldn't be compatibile with diablo. We need a stable/diablo branch of novaclient.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
